subject: Re: [junit] htmlunit
msgSnippet: ... HtmlUnit builds on the Apache http-client, not HttpUnit. It s jWebUnit that builds on HttpUnit. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your
messageBody:
Simon Chappell wrote:

> Is this new? I thought that when I checked out HtmlUnit a couple of years
> ago, it was built on top of HttpUnit, but I have a very bad memory! In light
> of your information I will take a fresh look at HtmlUnit. Thank you.

HtmlUnit builds on the Apache http-client, not HttpUnit. It's jWebUnit
that builds on HttpUnit.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
